ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Girls
ygData.msgSnippet: There s also the fact that people tend to be nicer to female characters and give them more stuff. However, male characters get listened to more often. If a
ygData.messageBody:
There's also the fact that people tend to be nicer to female characters and
give them more stuff. However, male characters get listened to more often.
If a female character is giving instructions people tend to either ignore
her or call her bitchy, but if a male character is giving instructions,
people are more likely to listen. Of course some people don't listen to
either gender. Well, I've noticed that they are more likely to listen to a
female now than they were a few years ago. Guys get more buddy-buddy with a
male character. I like playing a male character bc I get treated like one of
the guys. People joke with me and don't feel uncomfortable about saying
things that they wouldn't say if they knew I was female. Also, females are
more likely to be flirted with and asked their bra size. So annoying.
luv,
-Su

Well this is an opinion mind you, I think most guys like to play females
because of the way they look. I have played females as well as males and I
am a guy. A friend of mine when he played only played female characters,
when I asked him about it he said he liked the way they looked. Well that's
my two coppers.
